LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Juice_High.label: High on Solar Juice
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Juice_High.descripti: The ingested Solar Juice has a calming effect on the mind, reducing neural heat over time.
LanguageData.Miho_EntropyDump_High.label: Releasing neural heat
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Juice_Addiction.desc: A chemical addiction to Solar Juice.\nWithout regular doses of Solar Juice the body may experience pain, a lower state of conciusness, impaired movement, reduced sight, low blood pressure and reduced hand-eye coordination.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Juice_Tolerance.desc: A build-up tolerance to Solar Juice. The more severe this tolerance is, the more Solar Juice it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea_Addiction.label: Helianto addiction
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea_Tolerance.label: Helianto tolerance
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea_Tolerance.descri: A build-up tolerance to helianto based drugs. The more severe this tolerance is, the more Solar Tea or Solar Pipes it takes to get the same effect.
